about_the_game:
A cozy narrative experience that will warm your heart and deepen your appreciation for both Japanese soul food and human connection.

"Once upon a time, there was an oden stand... Built from wood said to be blessed by the gods themselves."
Take on the role of a shop owner who purchases this mystical stand and opens it for just seven special days.
Your mission? Serve the perfect oden to each customer while helping them overcome their personal struggles.

How to Play

ODEN is an intimate short adventure game driven by meaningful conversations. Every customer who visits your stand has their own story to tell. Choose the right oden ingredients for each person, and watch as your choices shape their destiny.
Listen carefully to their troubles, and aim to create as many happy endings as possible through your thoughtful service.
Your seven days as an oden vendor await - how many lives will you touch?
